title: Batch or storage location
content:
A). How to change batch or storage location after costing calculate ?

Tips : 

1. 1st copy shipment number
2. go to /NVT02N, paste here shipment number & press enter.
3. go to shipment Cst cal tab & click shpmnt cost Doc.
4. Copy shipment cost number
5. go to VI02 press enter. & paste shipment cost number and hit enter.
6. Double click on Net value amount.
7. go to settlement tab & tick check box and save all data.
8. Again go to VI02 pate shipment cost number here and hit enter button.
9. Now click on delivery icon and delete shipment cost number.
10. Now go to /NVT02N paste shipment number untick shipment competition and save.  
11. Now go to /NVL02N enter here delivery number.

 Now here you can change batch or storage location.
